meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by first-year classes and my major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I'm Veronica, a first-year English major. Last semester was really tough for me — I felt really confused about what I’m supposed to be doing, and my major was actually not clearly defined. I ended up taking a variety of classes, from literature to history to creative writing, and ended up with a 2.5 GPA. I’m still not sure what I want to do with my degree, and I’m feeling really anxious about graduation and what comes next. I’m in a really good academic community here, but I’m also feeling isolated and unsure how to connect with others who are going through similar experiences.
